live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
61397.summary: Some customers in Downton area of New Westminster are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
61397.title: May 21 - New Westminster (Downtown) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
